Create a business plan for a mobile app that helps users find and book unique walking tours of the world's most famous landmarks.
Develop a virtual reality game that allows players to explore and interact with different environments, including landmarks and natural wonders, as if they were walking on land.
Create a line of eco-friendly footwear that mimics the movement of a starfish, helping to reduce waste and promote sustainable practices.
Design a series of interactive exhibits for museums and science centers that showcase the science behind the movement of starfish on land, including their unique body structure and limbs.

Launch a crowdfunding campaign to support research on the development of a new type of robot that can walk on land like a starfish, with the goal of creating a new generation of robots that can navigate complex environments.
